name: Sydney Hunter and the Caverns of Death
overview: While exploring Mt. Doom on the mysterious Sundial Island, Sydney Hunter the Geologist and Adventurer is trapped inside the mountain. As he ventures deep into the caverns, Sydney finds evidence of human sacrifices used to appease the god of the volcano. Unfortunately for our hero, the volcano god has just awoken from its 1000 year slumber and now demands another sacrifice. Armed only with his trusty boomerang, Sydney must now use all of his abilities to escape from the CAVERNS OF DEATH!
